name: Mariusz Jan Skobel

Proven track record in developing and optimizing **financial systems** and **payment infrastructure**, ensuring compliance with industry standards and successful implementation of **compliance workflows**. Skilled in establishing efficient **data pipelines** and leveraging **analytics platforms** for business intelligence that drive tangible results. Demonstrated problem-solving capabilities and a commitment to improving existing systems, with a depth of expertise in hands-on software development and architecture. Proficient in cloud services including **Azure** and **AWS**, and familiar with modern tools and frameworks like **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, complemented by experience in leading MLOps initiatives with tools such as **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
